name: Sarah_Bernhardt
text:
Sarah Bernhardt
Sarah Bernhardt was an actress who performed in Camille in 1882, the first production staged at the Twin Peaks, Washington Opera House.
Bernhardt was involved in an accident that cost her a leg, which was replaced by a wooden one. While in Twin Peaks, the prosthetic was damaged on the shore of Black Lake. James Packard fashioned a replacement leg out of wood from a Douglas fir.
Behind the scenes
Saah Bernhardt (October 22 or 23, 1844 – March 26, 1923) was a French stage actress who performed in several popular French plays during the late 19th century and early 20th century.
